member.name: M:Hbm.Api.SensorDB.Dal.CategoryDataManager.DeleteCategory(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a category from the repository. Deleting will only succeed if the given category: 1. is not assigned as parent of other categories and 2. has no sensors assigned Otherwise an exception will be raised.
member.param: ID of the category to be deleted
member.remarks: The database model does not delete data cascading from the table translation (because of side-effects using triggers in VistaDB) Therefore the translation data of the category is deleted before deleting the category.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.SensorDB.Dal.CategoryDataManager.DeleteCategories(System.Collections.Generic.SortedDictionary{System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32}})
member.summary: Deletes categories from the repository.
member.param: Sorted dictionary by hierarchical level of IDs of the categories to be deleted
member.remarks: The database model does not delete data cascading from the table translation (because of side-effects using triggers in VistaDB) Therefore the translation data of the category is deleted before deleting the category.
member.returns: Number of categories that have been deleted.
member.exception: Thrown if a database error occurs. For example when deleting categories which are referenced by other categories.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.SensorDB.Dal.SensorDataManager.DeleteSensor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a sensor from the database
member.param: ID of the sensor to be deleted
member.remarks: The database model automatically deletes data cascading from referenced tables containing sensor data. The only exception of this rule is the table translation (because of side-effects using triggers in VistaDB) without cascading delete. Therefore the translation data of the sensor is deleted before deleting the sensor.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.SensorDB.Dal.SensorDataManager.DeleteSensors(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: Delete sensors from the database
member.param: IDs of the sensors to be deleted
member.returns: Number of affected rows.
member.remarks: The database model automatically deletes data cascading from referenced tables containing sensor data. The only exception of this rule is the table translation (because of side-effects using triggers in VistaDB) without cascading delete. Therefore the translation data of the sensor is deleted before deleting the sensor.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.SensorDB.SensorDBManager.DeleteOrphanTranslations
member.summary: Deletes all orphan entries from the table "Translation". Orphans may occur if database records (categories or sensors) are manually deleted from the database. Because of restrictions in VistaDB no triggers are used to preserve automatic data integrity between categories and their translations and sensors and their translations.
member.remarks: This administration method is not part of the ISensorDB interface.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.SensorDB.SensorDBManager.CheckForInvalidChildCategoryDeletion(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32},Hbm.Api.SensorDB.Entities.HierarchicalCategory,Hbm.Api.SensorDB.Entities.Category@)
member.summary: Iterates hierarchical categories to determine if the given deletion list is valid for deletion. It checks if the categories given by the has sensors and checks if sub categories are in the list as well (ensuring that there will be no primary key violation).
member.param: The deletion list containing the category ids to check against.
The current hierarchical category to check.
This object will be set by the invalid category id in the list, if a) the category has sensors. b) at least one child category is not marked for deletion. Pass null for initial state.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.SensorDB.SensorDBManager.BuildOrderedDeleteCategoryIdListInForeignKeyOrder(Hbm.Api.SensorDB.Entities.HierarchicalCategory,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: This method builds a sorted dictionary by hierarchical level to provides correct deletion order. This will ensures 'no primary key violations' when deleting. Call before to check for valid category id list!
member.param: List containing the category ids to be deleted. Must be a complete/consistent list!
member.returns: Ordered list of category ids ready for deletion by level.
member.remarks: Tree iteration (bottom to top, no recursion): a b c d e f g h i => efbgchida
